intro_text: It starts snowing soon after the patrol sets out
success_text: Despite the snow, the patrol manages to hunt successfully
fail_text: The prey must be hiding; the patrol catches nothing and is caught in a snowstorm
decline_text: They decide to turn back and wait until the snow dies down

intro_text: r_c thinks that it is too cold to patrol and that they should turn back
success_text: r_c warms up as they patrol the territory and says it isn't so bad anymore
fail_text: The cold is too much for r_c, they go missing and are later found frozen to death
decline_text: They decide to turn back and wait for warmer weather
